Title: ACRIB survey finds strong support for refrigerant training
Summary: ACRIB, an umbrella body of ten groups in the RACHP industry, said it had been calling for action on training for many years. It said it is meeting with Defra to ensure these views are taken into account as legislative changes approach.

Title: Optimised cooling needed for data centre boom, says Galebreaker
Summary: Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) modelling was being used for screen placement to optimise airflow and prevent hot air recirculation. He said this could be combined with AI to unlock new efficiencies.
